attributes.action: have Lord Coe and his accociates reconsider the appaling logo being suggested/used of the 2012 Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Logo released today for use in the build up to the 2012 London Olymics is a poor example of a Logo. It bears no reference to the city of london or the Olympics (apart from the Olymics rings) in its design. Can we please have something more creative and represents our country more closely.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
